methods.description: This endpoint returns contract history from FPDS for a specific vendor

parameters.name: duns
parameters.description: A 9-digit DUNS number that uniquely identifies a vendor (required).

parameters.name: naics
parameters.description: a six digit NAICS code used to filter by contracts with a certain NAICS

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: a field to sort on. Choices are date, status, agency, and amount

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The sort direction of the results. Choices are asc or desc.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: the page to start on. Results are paginated in increments of 100. Begins at page=1.

methods.description: This endpoint returns metadata for the most recent data loads of SAM and FPDS data
This endpoint lists all of the NAICS codes that are relevant to the OASIS family of vehicles
This endpoint returns a single vendor by their 9 digit DUNS number

parameters.name: duns
parameters.description: a nine digit DUNS number that uniquely identifies the vendor (required)

methods.description: This endpoint returns a list of vendors filtered by a NAICS code

parameters.name: setasides
parameters.description: a comma delimited list of two character setaside codes to filter by.  Ex. setasides=A6,A5  will filter by 8a and veteran owned business.

parameters.name: vehicle
parameters.description: Choices are either oasis or oasissb. Will filter vendors by their presence in either the OASIS unrestricted vehicle or the OASIS Small Business vehicle.

apiDescription:
This API drives the Discovery Market Research Tool. It contains information on the vendors that are part of the OASIS and OASIS Small Business contracting vehicles, such as their contracting history, their elligibility for contract awards, and their small business designations. To learn more about the tool, please visit Discovery or see the README on our GitHub repository.

Please note that the base path for this API is https://api.data.gov/gsa/discovery/

It requires an API key, obtainable at api.data.gov. It must be passed in the api_key parameter with each request.
